assignments.name: error
assignments.value: Only administrators can manage users. Your current role does not have this permission.

parameters.query: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM alfred.users WHERE slack_user_id = '{{ $('Workflow Input').item.json.slack_user_id }}') THEN true ELSE false END as user_exists, u.* FROM (SELECT 1) dummy LEFT JOIN alfred.users u ON u.slack_user_id = '{{ $('Workflow Input').item.json.slack_user_id }}'

assignments.name: error
assignments.value: =User {{ $json.slackUser.real_name }} ({{ $('Workflow Input').item.json.slack_user_id }}) already exists in the system.

assignments.name: google_auth_status
assignments.value: ={{ $('Prepare User Data').item.json.google_auth_method === 'service_account' ? 'Configured (Aclarify service account)' : 'Pending setup (user needs to connect Google account)' }}

assignments.name: message
assignments.value: =Successfully created user {{ $('Prepare User Data').item.json.display_name }} ({{ $('Prepare User Data').item.json.email }}) as {{ $('Prepare User Data').item.json.role }}. Timezone: {{ $('Prepare User Data').item.json.timezone_used }}.

assignments.name: error
assignments.value: =Invalid action '{{ $('Workflow Input').item.json.action }}'. Valid actions: create_user, update_user, list_users

parameters.query: UPDATE alfred.users SET slack_username = '{{ $json.slack_username }}', email = '{{ $json.email }}', google_auth_method = '{{ $json.google_auth_method }}', google_calendar_credential_id = {{ $json.google_calendar_credential_id ? "'" + $json.google_calendar_credential_id + "'" : 'NULL' }}, gmail_credential_id = {{ $json.gmail_credential_id ? "'" + $json.gmail_credential_id + "'" : 'NULL' }}, google_docs_credential_id = {{ $json.google_docs_credential_id ? "'" + $json.google_docs_credential_id + "'" : 'NULL' }}, calendar_ids = '{{ JSON.stringify($json.calendar_ids) }}'::jsonb, preferences = jsonb_set(COALESCE(preferences, '{}'::jsonb), '{timezone}', '"{{ $json.timezone }}"'), updated_at = NOW() WHERE slack_user_id = '{{ $json.slack_user_id }}' RETURNING *
